statements: DELETE FROM permissions WHERE participant_id = 100 AND access_level = 'Admin';
DELETE FROM permissions WHERE access_level = 'User' AND participant_id = 200;
DELETE FROM access_permissions WHERE permission_id IN (SELECT permission_id FROM access_permissions WHERE access_level_id = 2);
DELETE FROM participant_permissions WHERE permission_id = 3 AND participant_id = 2;
DELETE FROM participant_permissions WHERE participant_id = 1 AND permission_id = 2;
DELETE FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin' AND user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM blockchain_user_roles WHERE user_id = 123 AND role_id = 456;
DELETE FROM blockchain_role_network WHERE network_id = 789 AND role_id = 987;
DELETE FROM blockchain_network_permissions WHERE network_name = 'Test Network';
